name: ECCOS
details:
Neo-Vintage Tape Delay/Loop StationThe ECCOS features Keeley’s new Dream platform with its high-fidelity 24-bit DSP and codec.  True stereo in and out, presets, remote-switcher, and expression control surround the ECCOS with the features needed for professional pedal boards.  The ECCOS gives you everything from simple clean repeats to an all new sound created to put tape-flanged trails on your guitar. Flanged trails give you space and motion in your repeats, without the pitch modulation.  Delay lines are a linear extension of your guitar sound; the Keeley ECCOS gives you enhanced spatial dimension.
ECCOS Vintage Tape Flanged DelayECCOS Vintage Tape Flanged Delay
Neo-Vintage Tape Delay
True Stereo In/Out
24 bit Hi-Fi DREAM DSP
100% Analog dry audio signal
Time/Blend/Depth/Rate Control
Presets and Remote Control
Expression Pedal Control
Bypass/Trails – Foot Switchable
9VDC 130mA supply required
Designed and Made in the USA
$249
https://robertkeeley.com/product/eccos-stereo-neo-vintage-tape-delay/
